body: Hi all, I in the simulation that I was working on I needed to associated specific glazing ratio to each input surface. The current component assign the ratio based on surface orientation. I modified the Honeybee_glazing based on ratios component. It worked for my simulation, but I did not test it enough to be sure it is bug-free. You can access and review the python script to check or modify the changes. I just thought I share it in case others are trying to do similar thing. Thanks. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-7-17Ut3vwqQ6K7y12wy3PXYp1FilvuVf40v0RWuuQLLdwfBDDNKZQFL*tq3ZRAb1g7SLlJV1FydE7bUf5GMHnrc2QXnqykg/HB_CustomGlazingRatio.png)
topic: Glazing Ratio per surface (not surface orientation)
